languages.text: {n}Сквозь стук колотящегося сердца вы слышите голос Злобы, доносящийся издалека:{/n} "Заштопайте людишко. У не{mf|го|е} есть характер, я таких люблю".
{n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She} has character. I like those ones."
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь стук колотящегося сердца вы слышите голос Злобы, доносящийся издалека:{/n} "Заштопайте людишко. У не{mf|го|е} есть характер, я таких люблю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She} has character. I like that."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}通过心脏的跳动，你听到恶棍的声音从遥远的地方传了过来。{/n}“给这个小人儿包扎一下。{mf|他|她}很有个性，我喜欢这种人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She} has character. I like those ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}通过心脏的跳动，你听到恶棍的声音从遥远的地方传了过来。{/n}“给这个小人儿包扎一下。{mf|他|她}很有个性，我喜欢这种人。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Por encima del tambor de tu corazón, oyes la voz lejana de Malicia:{/n} «Tratad a{mf|l| la} human{mf|o|a}. Tiene carácter. Me gusta».
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She} has character. I like those ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por encima del tambor de tu corazón, oyes la voz lejana de Malicia:{/n} «Tratad a{mf|l| la} human{mf|o|a}. Tiene carácter. Me gusta».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}心臓の鼓動の合間に、遠くからマリスの声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「この人間を手当てしろ。こいつは根性がある。気に入った」
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She} has character. I like those ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}心臓の鼓動の合間に、遠くからマリスの声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「この人間を手当てしろ。こいつは根性がある。気に入った」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Über das Getrommel deines Herzens hörst du Tückes Stimme irgendwo aus der Ferne:{/n} "Flickt den Menschling zusammen. {mf|Er|Sie} hat Charakter. Solche mag ich."
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She} has character. I like those ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}Über das Getrommel deines Herzens hörst du Tückes Stimme irgendwo aus der Ferne:{/n} "Flickt den Menschling zusammen. {mf|Er|Sie} hat Charakter. Solche mag ich."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Sous les battements de votre cœur, vous entendez la voix de Démon au loin :{/n} « Remettez l'{mf|humain|humaine} sur pied. {mf|Il|Elle} a du caractère. Ça me plaît. »
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She} has character. I like those ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous les battements de votre cœur, vous entendez la voix de Démon au loin :{/n} « Remettez l'{mf|humain|humaine} sur pied. {mf|Il|Elle} a du caractère. Ça me plaît. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Kalp atışlarının arasında Melanet'in uzaktan gelen sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "İnsancığın yaralarına bir bakın. Mizacı hoşuma gitti."
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|He|She} has character. I like those ones."
